title: solo/duo exclamation  point
body: I was wondering why there's an exclamation point saying "you are being shielded from demotion but have lost too many games to maintain your current rank." I've been on winning streaks and would only lose one game then continue. Is it a bug? Has anyone else had this?

replies.body: Hmm, while we can't see when a demotion may occur I don't see a streak of losses either.  I recommend posting this over at our [bug report boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) for our QA team to look into.  Thanks for the report!
